title: EeeXP 1.0 SP2 - Windows XP for EeePC's
description:
--------Windows EeeXP-------- 

NEW VERSION IS AVAILABLE, SEARCH FOR EEEXP 2.0 ! FASTER AND MORE RELIABLE !!

--------------------------------


1.0 Specs:
------

This is a Windows XP SP2 Version for the Asus Eee PC.


The ISO is a 241mb file, with low RAM usage. 

Final Installation Size (After you remove the Page File, etc) will be about 500mb-600mb.


The Removed Functionality was minimal for the EeePC (For example PCMCIA cards which it does not have).


THIS VERSION KEEPS NETWORKING ABILITIES ! THIS WAY YOU CAN RUN A DVD FROM YOUR NETWORK, ETC.



The Included Themes are :


-Black Mesa
-VXP
-Zune (Many Color Schemes)
-Watercolor


-------------------------------------------

!!! IN ORDER TO SEE THE THEMES, YOU MUST DOWNLOAD THE MODIFIED UXTHEME.DLL. YOU CAN DOWNLOAD IT HERE : http://download1us.softpedia.com/dl/65cf1785807e6f254e0805d8983bfa26/4864f621/100002369/software/os_enhance/uxpatcher.zip

-------------------------------------------

This version includes Brazilian and USA (including US-International) Keyboards. 
In order to add another keyboard to your Eee PC follow these simple steps discovered by Zotemeyer:


- Find a computer running Windows XP with the correct (desired) Keyboard layout for your Eee PC.

- Open (NOT at Eee PC) WINDOWS/System32/kbdXX.dll (where XX is the layout of your keyboard: kbdus.dll is US, kbdbr.dll is Brazil, kbdsw.dll is Swedish...)

- Copy that file and RENAME it to "kbdus.dll"

- Open (Eee PC) : WINDOWS/System32 and PASTE the file you copied.

- Restart your Eee PC and Enjoy !



Thank you Zotemeyer for this marvellous solution !

-------------------------------------------

You can use the Image I designed (Eee PC eXtreme) for your Eee PC's system logo ! Just save it as a .BMP with the name "OEMLOGO.BMP", and paste it at your System 32 !
